SELECT B.BZENT_NM AS BF_INST_CD ,'' AS AF_INST_CD FROM MHDLG_DTL A INNER JOIN INST_BSC B ON A.CMPTNC_INST_NO = B.INST_MGNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.MHDLG_MGNO = #{mngNo} AND A.MHDLG_DGR = CAST(#{dgr} AS NUMERIC)
SELECT BZENT_NM ,BRNO ,INST_MGNO ,INST_CLSF_CD ,UP_INST_MGNO FROM INST_BSC WHERE 1=1 AND INST_MGNO = #{afInstCd} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
